CustomField.formula: IF(( MONTH( ScheduleDate ) >= 1 && MONTH( ScheduleDate ) <= 3 ), "Q1", IF(( MONTH( ScheduleDate ) >= 4 && MONTH( ScheduleDate ) <= 6 ), "Q2", IF(( MONTH( ScheduleDate ) >= 7 && MONTH( ScheduleDate ) <= 9 ), "Q3", "Q4"))) & " " & TEXT(YEAR(ScheduleDate))
CustomField.label: Schedule Line Name
